explains: n. 极端主义者，过激分子

sentences.en: A previously unknown extremist group has said it carried out Friday's bomb attack.
sentences.cn: 一个先前未知的极端分子组织声称其实施了周五的炸弹袭击。

sentences.en: Often, opposition comes not only from the conservatives, who cling to tradition, but also from the extremist militants, who favor neither the old nor the new.
sentences.cn: 通常，反对意见不仅来自坚持传统的保守派，也来自极端主义武装分子，他们既不喜欢旧的，也不喜欢新的。

sentences.en: Plato, of course, is an extremist.
